name: Crypto Analysis
prompt: Analyze cryptocurrency market trends focusing on Bitcoin, Ethereum, and major altcoins. Include price movements, market cap changes, and key developments.

name: AI Technology Report
prompt: Provide comprehensive analysis of AI industry developments, focusing on generative AI, LLMs, and major tech companies' AI initiatives.

name: Stock Market Analysis
prompt: Analyze global stock market performance including major indices, sector rotations, and notable company earnings.

name: Tech Innovation Report
prompt: Cover latest technology innovations, startup funding rounds, and emerging tech trends across various sectors.

name: Economic Indicators
prompt: Analyze global economic conditions including inflation data, central bank policies, and economic growth indicators.

name: Energy Market Report
prompt: Examine energy market trends including oil prices, renewable energy developments, and energy transition progress.
